    • Uses of AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io

      Methods in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.io that return AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties AcidUtils.getAcidOperationalProperties(org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Returns the acidOperationalProperties for a given configuration.
      static AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties AcidUtils.getAcidOperationalProperties(Map<String,String> parameters)
      Returns the acidOperationalProperties for a given map.
      static AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties AcidUtils.getAcidOperationalProperties(Properties props)
      Returns the acidOperationalProperties for a given set of properties.
      static AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties AcidUtils.getAcidOperationalProperties(Table table)
      Returns the acidOperationalProperties for a given table.
      static AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties.getDefault()
      Returns an acidOperationalProperties object that represents default ACID behavior for tables that do no explicitly specify/override the default behavior.
      static AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties.getInsertOnly()
      Returns an acidOperationalProperties object for tables that uses ACID framework but only supports INSERT operation and does not require ORC or bucketing
      static AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties.parseInt(int properties)
      Returns an acidOperationalProperties object that is represented by an encoded 32-bit integer.
      static AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties.parseString(String propertiesStr)
      Returns an acidOperationalProperties object that is represented by an encoded string.
      AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties.setHashBasedMerge(boolean isHashBasedMerge)
      Sets the hash-based merge property for ACID operations that combines delta files using GRACE hash join based approach, when turned on.
      AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties.setInsertOnly(boolean isInsertOnly) 
      AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties AcidUtils.AcidOperationalProperties.setSplitUpdate(boolean isSplitUpdate)
      Sets the split update property for ACID operations based on the boolean argument.
